mapper.sql: id,mission_id, direction, possessor_id, possessor_type, status, create_time, update_time, creater_id, updater_id, is_active,colth_id,hotel_id
mapper.select: select count(1) FROM cloth_log WHERE id IN ( SELECT max( id ) FROM cloth_log GROUP BY cloth_id ) AND hotel_id = #{hotel_id} AND possessor_type in (0,1,2)

SELECT * FROM cloth_log as cl LEFT JOIN cloth as c on cl.cloth_id = c.id WHERE cl.id IN ( SELECT max( cloth_log.id ) FROM cloth_log GROUP BY cloth_log.cloth_id ) AND cl.hotel_id = #{hotel_id} AND cl.direction =1 AND cl.possessor_id= #{room_id} AND cl.possessor_type= #{possessor_type}

SELECT * FROM cloth_log as cl LEFT JOIN cloth as c on cl.cloth_id = c.id WHERE cl.id IN ( SELECT max( cloth_log.id ) FROM cloth_log GROUP BY cloth_log.cloth_id ) AND cl.hotel_id = #{hotel_id} AND cl.direction =1
AND cl.possessor_type=#{possessor_type}
and c.comment IS NOT null
order by cl.create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into cloth_log (id, mission_id,direction, possessor_id, possessor_type, status, create_time, update_time, creater_id, updater_id, is_active,cloth_id,hotel_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{possessor_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{possessor_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{is_active,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{cloth_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{hotel_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update cloth_log
mission_id = #{mission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER},
possessor_id = #{possessor_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
possessor_type = #{possessor_type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
creater_id = #{creater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
updater_id = #{updater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_active = #{is_active,jdbcType=TINYINT},
cloth_id = #{cloth_id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
hotel_id = #{hotel_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update cloth_log set mission_id = #{mission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=INTEGER}, possessor_id = #{possessor_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, possessor_type = #{possessor_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{create_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{update_time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, creater_id = #{creater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updater_id = #{updater_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_active = #{is_active,jdbcType=TINYINT}, cloth_id = #{cloth_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, hotel_id = #{hotel_idï¼ŒjdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cloth_log AS cl WHERE cloth_id = #{cloth_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY cloth_id HAVING cl.possessor_type = 2 AND cl.possessor_id = #{hotel_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cl.direction = 1
select cloth_id from cloth_log where mission_id = #{mission_id} and direction = #{direction} and possessor_type = #{possessor_type} and status=#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT distinct cl.cloth_id FROM cloth_log AS cl WHERE cl.mission_id = #{mission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM cloth_log WHERE possessor_id = #{possessor_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND possessor_type = #{possessor_type,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT * FROM cloth_log WHERE mission_id = #{mission_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT cl.* FROM cloth_log cl JOIN mission m ON cl.hotel_id = #{hotel_id} AND cl.mission_id = #{mission_id} AND cl.possessor_type = 0 AND cl.possessor_id = #{possessor_id} AND cl.`status` = 0 AND cl.direction = 1 AND cl.mission_id = m.id AND m.`status` = 1
SELECT * FROM cloth_log WHERE id = (SELECT max( cloth_log.id ) FROM cloth_log WHERE cloth_id = #{cloth_id})
